dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:12,000,000 (E 92째20'00"--E 101째20'00"/N 25째30'00"--N 12째30'00"). Relief shown pictorially. On verso: French text, entitled: Description de Bengala. Oriented with north to the left. Page number in upper left: 734. Likely from: Tabularum geographicarum contractarum libri septem / Petrus Bertius. 1602. Dimensions: 9 x 13 centimeters
